name: caffpay
description: Payments & Invoicing Template on Internet Computer Protocol

scripts.ic:deploy:local: cd src/backend && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cd ../../frontend && npm run build && cd .. && dfx deploy --network local && dfx generate
scripts.ic:deploy:ic: cd src/backend && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cd ../../frontend && npm run build && cd .. && dfx deploy --network ic && dfx generate
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: dfx stop && rm -rf .dfx && rm -rf src/backend/target && rm -rf frontend/out && rm -rf frontend/.next
